doc.title: (Hate) Machine
doc.plot: Innocent words, beautiful children, transparent direction, unexpected results: these are the elements of (Hate) Machine, a short film that explores the process of creating media. Produced in reaction to media influenced xenophobia, (Hate) Machine cleverly explores harmless raw footage and the extraordinary messages it can contain. With our society's growing reliance on mediated second-hand information, this thoughtful and affecting film underscores the importance of media literacy.
